DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study ass user ' ability administer full dose evolocumab home-use use either pre-filled syringe autoinjector/pen .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess In-home Use Evolocumab ( AMG 145 ) Using Prefilled Syringe Prefilled Autoinjector/Pen
DOC.criteria: Fasting LDLC screen > 85 mg/dL Fasting triglyceride less equal 400 mg/dL ( 4.5 mmol/L ) Exclusion Criteria : New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) III IV heart failure Uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia Uncontrolled hypertension Type 1 diabetes poorly control type 2 diabetes Uncontrolled hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism
